original_title: The Beautiful Hen Behind the Yao Mountain
overview: A man named Amadu falls in love with Asuwema, a girl from the other side of Yao Mountain. Later Amadu impregnates Asuwema and as they are about to get married, it is discovered that Amadu is Asuwema's brother. The film was shot in the Malawi Mangochi District at Che Moto Village.
title: The Beautiful Hen Behind the Yao Mountain
